text_logic_form: The length of the line $RS$ is $x + 9$.
The length of the line $ST$ is $2x$.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x - 9$.
Find the length of the line $ST$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $RS$ is $x + 9$.
The length of the line $ST$ is $2x$.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x - 9$.
Find the length of the line $ST$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TA$ is $2x$.
The length of the line $RA$ is $x + 9$.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x - 9$.
line_instances: There are lines $RA$, $RT$, and $TA$, forming the equilateral triangle $RST$.
The lines $RA$ and $RT$ are the diagonals of the equilateral triangle $RST$.
